rides.name: Galactic Gauntlet
rides.description: A thrilling roller coaster ride through space, filled with loops, twists and turns.

rides.name: Jungle Safari Expedition
rides.description: An exciting jeep ride through the jungle, filled with animatronic animals and lush greenery.

rides.name: Dragon's Lair
rides.description: A dark and spooky roller coaster ride through a dragon-infested cave.

rides.name: Pirate's Plunder Ship
rides.description: A thrilling boat ride through a pirate-infested island, filled with treasure and danger.

rides.name: Fairy Tale Fantasy Castle
rides.description: A magical castle filled with fairy tale characters, princesses and knights.

rides.name: Wild West Shootout
rides.description: An action-packed shooting gallery ride through the wild west, filled with bandits and cowboys.

rides.name: Dinosaur Discovery Expedition
rides.description: An educational ride through a prehistoric jungle, filled with life-sized dinosaur replicas and fossils.

rides.name: Enchanted Carousel
rides.description: A magical carousel ride with beautifully decorated horses and chariots.

gardens.name: Botanical Garden
gardens.description: A garden within the theme park fillled with exotic plant, flowers and trees.

gardens.name: Jurassic Park
gardens.description: Prehistoric garden filled with life-sized dinosaur replicas, fossils and giant plants such as ferns and palm trees.

gardens.name: Fairy Tale Forest
gardens.description: A garden filled with story book figure, mini cottage, trees, mushrooms, flowers and night lights.

gardens.name: Galaxy Garden
gardens.description: An extraordinary garden filled with alien plants, glowing flowers and trees, and space-themed decorations. All found underground.
